ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: they said, 'We found our fathers worshipping them.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They replied: "We found our fathers worshipping them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They answered: "We found our fathers worshipping them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They replied, "We found our fathers worshipping them".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “We found our forefathers worshipping them.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "We found our fathers worshipping them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: We found our fathers worshipping them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'We found our fathers serving them.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: We found our fathers worshippers of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They replied, "We found our fathers worshipping them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: we found our fathers the worshippers thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘We found our fathers worshipping them.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said, "We found our fathers worshipping them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said:"We found our fathers worshipping them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'We found our fathers worshipping them'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “We found our parents worshiping them.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "We found our fathers worshippers of them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:53] They said, ‘We found our fathers worshipping them’, and so we followed their example.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: We found our fathers worshippers of them) and so we worship them.
